website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel exterior of this oil sprayer makes it both stylish and practical.
pros: Has two lids to help keep the product and your surroundings clean from excess oil
Can also be used for other types of liquids
Great for taking outside to the barbecue
cons: While this is rated dishwasher safe, it may require hand-washing to get clean

customer_reviews.title: Simple pump spray action
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a new oil sprayer. I had one that you pump, it was awful. I saw this one and had to try it. I recently got an air fryer so I needed one that worked. This one did fine. It's just a simple pump sprayer. No frills and that suits me just fine. It gives nice coverage of the food and its not hard to spray. The container holds a good bit of oil too. It's a nice silver finish so if you want to leave it out on your counter it looks nice. Glad I got it! I'm trying it on wings next!
customer_reviews.author: LaShawnda

customer_reviews.title: BEST REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Just to be clear, what you are ordering is a metal can with a screw-on top similar to what you would find on a bottle of hairspray. The container is well made. Simple operation: Unscrew sprayer unit, put in what you want to spray, screw sprayer unit back on container and pump with index finger to get spray. That's it. Nothing more, nothing less. From reading the reviews here, you think you are ordering something with 2 chambers where you can dial in the percentage of each oil you want to use. Perhaps those reviews are for another product, not this one. The product seems to work fine. I gave 4 stars because of the confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Sprays oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil sprayer to put some olive oil on it. I washed the container before using it and it was hard to wash. The spray is not as consistent as I wanted it to be. It strays like a stream if you don’t press it fast enough. Sprays well if you press it hard and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount
customer_reviews.text: This is great with my homemade infused oils. It's just the right amount I want to use on my salad or any food, not soaking in oil. Its a healthy choice of eating. The bottle is really beautiful stainless steel, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It also looks very nice, especially if you have a kitchen with stainless ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this multiple times a day. It sprays evenly each time and doesn't clog. I have already refilled it, and it works just as well as the first time. It also looks very nice, especially if you have a kitchen with stainless steal appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this sprayer! The bottle is a good quality stainless steel and works well. My daughter uses it to spray her small plants and to keep her hamster cool 😊 It works well for spraying cooking/baking pans and as desribed. See pics for actual product!
customer_reviews.author: Lee DP

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer is very convenient!! Less of a mess & sprays evenly unlike pouring the oil on directly! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Clorissa Bohm

customer_reviews.title: ... to see it was just a typical plastic sprayer like you would find on a cheap bottle of hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Was very surprised when I opened the package to see it was just a typical plastic sprayer like you would find on a cheap bottle of hairspray. It was difficult push down and spray. already with the first use it doesn’t always spray when pressed. 2 stars is for the container part would not recommend and feel like it was a waste of money. Purchased for kitchen use
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: oil sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: all stainless sprayer bottle . been looking for something like without much of plastic presence in the container I bought the product . at the first use i felt pretty hard. i was hoping it will spray like the one they showed in the picture . btw i'm using this product peanut oil not olive oil. at later thought i missed importance tips they mentioned on the how to begin using the product with warm water before actually start using the oil. i'll keep this comment posted if any of experience changed.
customer_reviews.author: tech geek

customer_reviews.title: nice even spray
customer_reviews.text: Good oil spray with wider coverage of spary area which means with just one push you will cover good amount of food area. I use it for to bake french fries and they turn out nice brown. Coming to the handyness its sized right to hold and spray. The amount of oil it can hold is also good. But dont fill it to the top this will lead to leaking when you spray. May be something for the product to be improved?
customer_reviews.author: Yogesh

customer_reviews.title: Good to add flavor or grease pans/grill grate
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil sprayer to spritz extra virgin olive oil on to my food and to great a pan or grill grate before I put food on it. It is made of this stainless steel material and it seems to be pretty durable. I also use it to spray oil onto my salads. Good buy because I've been using it a lot this past week since getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Lam

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice kitchen tool to have
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice kitchen tool to have. It is not fancy, but i wasn't looking for anything too fancy. I just needed a reliable sprayer that I can use to cook with. I do a lot of roasted vegetables and this sprayer is perfect for that use. Nice even spray, and doesn't get clogged.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully! Easy to fill and use
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully! Easy to fill and use. It gives you a full, even spray with each pump! I really enjoyed using this while grilling the last few nights!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't spray. Only came out in stream. Disappointed. Stopped working completely after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Franz

customer_reviews.title: Good for BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Good for recycle bottle to fill out the oil for BBQ!
customer_reviews.author: kathyli75

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it for spraying oil on food going into air fryer. Never too much oil.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful1

product_meta.title: Yangyun Upgraded Olive Oil Sprayer Bottle for Cooking Best Spray Effect Stainless Steel Oil Mister Dispenser for BBQ Salad Roasting Baking Grilling Frying Kitchen
product_meta.description:
Our oil sprayer can be used as olive oil sprayer dispenser, water sprayer,beauty spray etc.Put the liquid into the fog, control the amount of liquid, spray evenly.Perfect for low-fat cooking, grilling, saute, roasting and barbecue.High-quality stainless steel ensures its durability.
The oil dispenser is handy and won’t slide away with the anti-skid design,simple pumping action that produces a fine mist, more uniform in spraying and accurately control the amount of oil per time used in cooking. 
Our oil sprayer equipped with two caps,keep it cleaner and healthier. 

Product Specifications: 
Material: stainless steel 
Size(approx): 7.5×2 in 
Capacity: 240ml/8.2oz 

Package Includes: 
1×Oil sprayer 

Warm Tips: 
1.1s interval between each press,sprays a mist will be better. 
2.We suggest you clean it before filling something.To clean,fill the bottle with hot tap water and add one drop of liquid detergent.Pressing until resistance is felt,then spray into the sink.To rinse, repeat the sequence using fresh hot water. 
3.Please keep it dry after cleaning.Tighten the cap and store at room temperature until next use.When you use it, please try to pump the sprayer for more times until it is works well. 
4.The better usage is tilt bottle and press. 
5.Maybe there is some residual on head after using, please prepare tissue or cleaning cloth to wipe. 
6.Please don't put solid stuff in it to avoid sprayer nozzle blocked. 
7.It is recommended you clean your cooking oil sprayer every 6-8 weeks. This ensures the best performance since oil can build up in the sprayer. 
8.Please do not store vinegar and other weak acid liquids for a long time.
feature_bullets: BEST SPRAY EFFECT:Our oil sprayer using an upgraded nozzle,makes spray better,perfectly solves the defects of other products.
HIGH-QUALITY OIL SPRAY BOTTLE:Oil pump sprayer is made of stainless steel,making it cleaner and healthier.It is perfect kitchenware tools for home & kitchen.

REUSABLE & MULTI-PURPOSE USE OIL SPRAYER:Fill this sprayer with your favorite oils, sunflower oil, vinegar, soy sauce, lemon and lime juice, sherry or marsala wine.Perfect for spraying ingredients instead of using a brushes when roasting, sauteing, baking, cooking.
PORTABLE DESIGN:This grill/pan greaser is handy with a small size that can be handled in one hand.It's also a perfect size to carry outside for BBQ,picnic,junket,grilling,roasting etc.
WARRANTY:180 days unconditional 100% refund or free exchange guaranty.If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via Amazon message system.
